title: If the athaan is called, can I continue to eat and drink until the end of it? | Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: so Asaph's question well if the event is called and you know that this is called on the right time you must not eat or drink only if you have a glass of water in your hand and the event is given you may drink but to reach out after the iodine has started this is not permissible
